title: Update stage aging calculation to use canonical stage_entered_at (with deterministic fallback)

sections.text: Stage aging in sales_forecast should compute time-in-stage from the imported canonical stage_entered_at values rather than opportunity created_at/updated_at. Update the stage aging service/queries to consistently select the latest transition timestamp for the current stage and apply a clear fallback only when stage_entered_at is missing. Add lightweight regression coverage to ensure rollups and historical conversion benchmarks consume the corrected stage aging output.
